item.title: "Git" The Basics: A Version Control Cheat Sheet
item.description:
I am finally starting to understandgit version control! It makes developing a project on different computers easy. Some of these notes were picked up from the super informativeReproducible Data Analysis in Jupyter video seriesby Jake VanderPlas, author of thePython Data Science Handbook.
